Welcome!

With certified administrators, PQC Service team is always ready (24 hour and 7 days per week) to rescue you and help in any situation.

We offer 2 virtualsiations, that guarantee 100% RAM, give you 1 GBS port, and fast SSD disc with latest E5 processor:

UK, Germany, Bulgaria and Ukraine - you can found all the info here:
http://pqcservice.net/dedicated-hosting.html

And remember that our price Includes full managed service and absolutely free Administration.
It means when you buy any server or VPS, you get 100% free

support!

Main Data Center Charlotte airport, North Carolina Tier 3
24/7 Support

Admins with Linux System Administrator Certification of L1, L2 and L3 levels
ISO Certification
